revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: Theory of interest, simple and compound, derived from first principles, and applied to annuities of all descriptions..., by the Reverend Mr David Wilkie, Minister of..."
revision.text: Possibly: Theory of interest, simple and compound, derived from first principles, and applied to annuities of all descriptions..., by the Reverend Mr David Wilkie, Minister of Cults. (Edinburgh : Printed for the author. And sold by Peter Hill, Edinburgh ; and G. G. & J. Robinson, London, 1794). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2046899~S1
